h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Flame Orb Location
content: The Flame Orb is dropped upon defeating the Rusty-Gold Cart in The Flaming Mountains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flame_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Flame Orb', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Flame Orb Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Flame Orb is dropped upon defeating the Rusty-Gold Cart in The Flaming Mountains.
